metadata.title: CVE-2021-39941 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in GitLab CE/EE versions 12.0 to14.3.6, 14.4 to 14.4.4, and 14.5 to 14.5.2 allowed non-project members tosee the default branch name for projects that restrict access to therepository to project members

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
